name: Signal Break
description: Crack the hidden 4-symbol sequence in 6 guesses using deduction feedback -- each guess narrows 1,296 possibilities down to one.
focus: Infinite to One + Seek vs Solve + The Share Tells a Story -- a collapsing possibility space where every guess is a strategic choice between gathering intel and going for the kill, with a share that encodes the shape of your deduction journey.
